amendment.description: Amendment requires a GAO study on the ability of state and local law enforcement authorities to verify the validity of out-of-state concealed firearms permits.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 112-283 to require a GAO study on the ability of state and local law enforcement authorities to verify the validity of out-of-state concealed firearms permits.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Reichert amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
